FOOTBALL TOUR TO SPAIN
Dear Parents,
The PE department is delighted to announce that we have been invited to take part in a Key Stage 3 football tournament in Spain.
This is an amazing opportunity to represent the school at an overseas tournament held during the October halfterm break. This is a great chance for the children to develop their skills and put them to the test, against Spanish opposition.
The tour is organised by a professional company called Activ4, who will look after the team during the stay in Spain. They will organise everything from fixtures, food and entertainment. During the stay the boys will not only take part in games and training sessions, they will also flavor the delights of Spain. This will include a day trip to Barcelona and a VIP tour of the Nou Camp stadium. Depending on fixtures, this may also include a Barcelona match.
Key Information:
- Dates - Saturday 20th – Friday 27th of October 2012, which is during the schools half term break. Specific dates during the half term break are TBC.
- Price - £520, which is excluding flights. A final price, including flights, will be provided after numbers have been finalised and flights have been booked. Flights have been fluctuating between £150 and £200
For more information then please visit http://www.activ4.com/
The above information is being shared with you first before, this is to allow you to decide whether or not this is of interest to you.
If you are genuinely interested in this opportunity then please look at the following steps below:
1 – An announcement will be made to pupils in Assembly on Monday the 4th June. This will promote the tour and give key information.
2 – A letter will go home with pupils following the assembly. If you are genuinely interested, then the form willneed to be returned to the PE department to confirm attendance at the trialdate.
3 – A trial will be held at the school on Saturday the 9th June from 9-10.30am for pupils in Years 6 – 9 (as of August 2012)
4 – Team will be picked and announced to those who are lucky enough to be chosen. This will be a maximum of 20.
5 – A financial contribution will need to be made to fully commit to the tour. This will be a deposit of £200, which will need to be paid before the summer holidays. The final outstanding price will be required in September. A price will be confirmed after the summer once flights have been booked. Flights have been fluctuating between £150 - £250.
6 – A small presentation evening will take place to discuss the tour, visa processes, final prices, payment plans and to address any question you might have.
If you have any questions regarding all the information above then please do not hesitate to get in touch. Adam.hoult@internationalschool.ru
Thank you for taking the time to read.
Kindest Regards,
The PE Department
